<JD_START>
Job Title: EC Teacher for '24/'25 Needed!

Location: Elizabethtown, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Education, Training

Description:
Amergis Healthcare Staffing is looking for passionate EC Teachers!

We are looking to bring some quality teachers to a Charter School in Elizabethtown, NC for the '24/'25 school year. I've listed some details down below!

About the Charter School:

Founded in 2017K-8 students (7th and 8th grade students have their own building)INCREDIBLE CULTURE - Everyone is friendly and very supportive of each other. Group of Educators who love what they do. Great opportunity for a teacher who may be burnt out and looking for something differentSchool is growing, especially EC populationTotal school population is around 560 students. EC population is close to 100.


Contract:

 2024 - 2025 School Year Hours follow the school bell schedule $30/hr Paid Weekly Health Insurance and Other Benefits


Requirements:

Bachelors DegreeEC Teacher certificate is preferred but not requiredTeaching experience required (at least 1 year)Must be organized, a team player, willing to step up and help out, good with people/studentsSupported by EC Director (she's amazing!) and Teacher Assistants


Thank you for taking the time to review this opportunity. If this isn't quite what your looking for, Amergis has plenty of other roles in healthcare we can get you set up with! From here in North Carolina to across the entire US!

You can reach me at-

Phone: (910) 605-4118

Email: stgeorge@amergis.com

Benefits

At Amergis, we firmly believe that our employees are the heartbeat of our organization and we are happy to offer the following benefits:

Competitive pay & weekly paychecksHealth, dental, vision, and life insurance401(k) savings planAwards and recognition programs Benefit eligibility is dependent on employment status.


About Amergis

Amergis, formerly known as Maxim Healthcare Staffing, has served our clients and communities by connecting people to the work that matters since 1988. We provide meaningful opportunities to our extensive network of healthcare and school-based professionals, ready to work in any hospital, government facility, or school. Through partnership and innovation, Amergis creates unmatched staffing experiences to deliver the best workforce solutions.

Amergis is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

769671

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
